message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great fit for your needs. I'm willing to offer you the product for $7,500. It's a great price, considering the value it will bring to your business.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $6,800 for the product.

I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $6,800. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product for $7,200. It's still a great deal, considering the value it will bring to your business.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $6,900 for the product.

I understand you're still looking to save some money, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go below $7,100. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product for $7,100. This is the lowest I can go, and I think it's still a great deal for you.
I appreciate your concessions, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $6,800 for the product.

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're not going to be able to come to an agreement, Bob. However, I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll meet you at $7,000, and that's as low as I'm willing to go. If you're still not interested, I'll have to consider selling to someone else.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $7,000, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $6,900 for the product.
